title: The Aesthetics of Joy
description:
How do tangible things create an intangible feeling of joy? This is the question author and designer Ingrid Fetell Lee pondered while researching the relationship between joy and design. In this episode, she shares her findings with Nikki for Hunt for Happiness Week. 

Buy a copy of Ingrid’s book, Joyful: https://aestheticsofjoy.com/the-book/ 

Learn more about the aesthetics of joy online at AestheticsOfJoy.com/ 

Follow Ingrid on Instagram @aestheticsofjoy
